room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Columbus
review: Great escape room with our super awesome host Patrick and our very scary zombie Kat.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Columbus
review: My group of 11 people did the 80's dance party and had a blast! DJ PJ kept our experience "like totally awesome, dude!" He also gave help when we needed it most. Definitely a fun room (or maybe I should say basement.)

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Columbus
review: This was a really fun hour - the hosts are great and I really felt like I was trapped in a room with a real zombie! Highly recommended for a fun different activity with friends or family

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Columbus
review: This was a really fun and collaborative team building activity. At the end, each person gets an assessment of their strengths and what they contributed to the effort. It was a lot of fun. Wear casual clothes and sneakers. It may get warm and as you are escaping the zombie your feet may get stepped on. Lots of fun!
